title: Naviam Maximo Developer Tools Deployment File

properties.description: An array of Maximo properties to be deployed to the target system.

messages.description: An array of Maximo messages to be deployed to the target system.

loggers.description: An array of Maximo loggers to be deployed to the target system.

cronTasks.description: An array of Maximo cron tasks to be deployed to the target system.

domains.description: An array of Maximo domains to be deployed to the target system.

delete.description: Flag to indicate that the domain should be deleted if it exists from the target system.

domainId.description: The domain ID for the Maximo domain (MAXDOMAIN.DOMAINID)

domainType.description: The domain type for the Maximo domain (MAXDOMAIN.DOMAINTYPE)

scale.description: The scale for the Maximo domain (MAXDOMAIN.SCALE)

description.description: The description for the Maximo domain (MAXDOMAIN.DESCRIPTION)

maxType.description: The Maximo type for the Maximo domain (MAXDOMAIN.MAXTYPE)

length.description: The length for the Maximo domain (MAXDOMAIN.LENGTH)

alnDomain.description: The alnDomain values for the Maximo object

orgId.description: Organization ID of ALN domain row (ALNDOMAIN.ORGID)

siteId.description: Site ID of ALN domain row (ALNDOMAIN.SITEID)

maxDomValCond.description: An array of parameter values for the domain value conditions.

conditionNum.description: Condition number for the domain value condition (MAXDOMVALCOND.CONDITIONNUM)

objectName.description: Object name for the domain value condition (MAXDOMVALCOND.OBJECTNAME)

numericDomain.description: The numericDomain values for the Maximo object

orgId.description: Organization ID of NUMERIC domain row (NUMERICDOMAIN.ORGID)

siteId.description: Site ID of NUMERIC domain row (NUMERICDOMAIN.SITEID)

maxDomValCond.description: An array of parameter values for the domain value conditions.

conditionNum.description: Condition number for the domain value condition (MAXDOMVALCOND.CONDITIONNUM)

objectName.description: Object name for the domain value condition (MAXDOMVALCOND.OBJECTNAME)

numRangeDomain.description: The numericDomain values for the Maximo object

rangeSegment.description: Range segment for NUMRANGE domain row (NUMRANGEDOMAIN.RANGESEGMENT)

rangeMinimum.description: Range minimum of NUMRANGE domain row (NUMRANGEDOMAIN.RANGEMINIMUM)

rangeMaximum.description: Range maximum of NUMRANGE domain row (NUMRANGEDOMAIN.RANGEMAXIMUM)

rangeInterval.description: Range interval of NUMRANGE domain row (NUMRANGEDOMAIN.RANGEINTERVAL)

orgId.description: Organization ID of NUMRANGE domain row (NUMRANGEDOMAIN.ORGID)

siteId.description: Site ID of NUMRANGE domain row (NUMRANGEDOMAIN.SITEID)

maxDomValCond.description: An array of parameter values for the domain value conditions.

conditionNum.description: Condition number for the domain value condition (MAXDOMVALCOND.CONDITIONNUM)

objectName.description: Object name for the domain value condition (MAXDOMVALCOND.OBJECTNAME)

synonymDomain.description: The synonymDomain values for the Maximo object

maxValue.description: Maximo value for SYNONYM domain row (SYNONYMDOMAIN.MAXVALUE)

orgId.description: Organization ID of SYNONYM domain row (SYNONYMDOMAIN.ORGID)

siteId.description: Site ID of SYNONYM domain row (SYNONYMDOMAIN.SITEID)

defaults.description: Defaults flag of SYNONYM domain row (SYNONYMDOMAIN.DEFAULTS)

maxDomValCond.description: An array of parameter values for the domain value conditions.

conditionNum.description: Condition number for the domain value condition (MAXDOMVALCOND.CONDITIONNUM)

objectName.description: Object name for the domain value condition (MAXDOMVALCOND.OBJECTNAME)

tableDomain.description: The tableDomain values for the Maximo object

objectName.description: Object name for TABLE domain row (TABLEDOMAIN.OBJECTNAME)

validtnWhereClause.description: Validation where clause of TABLE domain row (TABLEDOMAIN.VALIDTNWHERECLAUSE)

listWhereClause.description: List where clause of TABLE domain row (TABLEDOMAIN.LISTWHERECLAUSE)

errorResourcBundle.description: Error resource bundle of TABLE domain row (TABLEDOMAIN.ERRORRESOURCBUNDLE)

errorAccessKey.description: Error access key of TABLE domain row (TABLEDOMAIN.ERRORACCESSKEY)

orgId.description: Organization ID of TABLE domain row (TABLEDOMAIN.ORGID)

siteId.description: Site ID of TABLE domain row (TABLEDOMAIN.SITEID)

crossoverDomain.description: The crossoverDomain values for the Maximo object

objectName.description: Object name for TABLE domain row (TABLEDOMAIN.OBJECTNAME)

validtnWhereClause.description: Validation where clause of TABLE domain row (TABLEDOMAIN.VALIDTNWHERECLAUSE)

listWhereClause.description: List where clause of TABLE domain row (TABLEDOMAIN.LISTWHERECLAUSE)

errorResourcBundle.description: Error resource bundle of TABLE domain row (TABLEDOMAIN.ERRORRESOURCBUNDLE)

errorAccessKey.description: Error access key of TABLE domain row (TABLEDOMAIN.ERRORACCESSKEY)

orgId.description: Organization ID of TABLE domain row (TABLEDOMAIN.ORGID)

siteId.description: Site ID of TABLE domain row (TABLEDOMAIN.SITEID)

crossoverFields.description: An array of parameter values for the crossover fields.

sourceField.description: Source field for the crossover domain row (CROSSOVERDOMAIN.SOURCEFIELD)

destField.description: Destination field name for the crossover domain row (CROSSOVERDOMAIN.DESTFIELD)

copyEvenIfSrcNull.description: Copy even if source is null flag for the crossover domain row (CROSSOVERDOMAIN.COPYEVENIFSRCNULL)

copyOnlyIfDestNull.description: Copy only if destination is null flag for the crossover domain row (CROSSOVERDOMAIN.COPYONLYIFDESTNULL)

sourceCondition.description: Source condition for the crossover domain row (CROSSOVERDOMAIN.SOURCECONDITION)

destCondition.description: Destination condition for the crossover domain row (CROSSOVERDOMAIN.DESTCONDITION)

sequence.description: Sequence for the crossover domain row (CROSSOVERDOMAIN.SEQUENCE)

delete.description: Flag to indicate that the cron task should be deleted if it exists from the target system.

cronTaskName.description: The name of the Cron Task (CRONTASKDEF.CRONTASKNAME)

description.description: The description of the Cron Task (CRONTASKDEF.DESCRIPTION)

className.description: The Java class name of the Cron Task implementation (CRONTASKDEF.CLASSNAME)

accessLevel.description: The access level for the Maximo Cron Task (CRONTASKDEF.ACCESSLEVEL)

cronTaskInstance.description: An array of Maximo Cron Task instance definitions

instanceName.description: The name of the Cron Task instance (CRONTASKINSTANCE.INSTANCENAME)

description.description: The description of the Cron Task instance (CRONTASKINSTANCE.DESCRIPTION)

schedule.description: The schedule of the Cron Task instance in Unix cron task format (CRONTASKINSTANCE.SCHEDULE)

active.description: Flag to indicate if the Cron Task instance is active or not (CRONTASKINSTANCE.ACTIVE)

keepHistory.description: Flag to indicate if the Cron Task instance will retain a history of runs or not (CRONTASKINSTANCE.RETAINHISTORY)

runAsUserId.description: The user Id that will be used to run the Cron Task instance, must be a valid Maximo user Id (CRONTASKINSTANCE.RUNASUSERID)

maxHistory.description: The maximum number of history records to retain (CRONTASKINSTANCE.MAXHISTORY)

cronTaskParam.description: An array of parameter values for the Cron Task instance.

parameter.description: The name of the Cron Task parameter.  The parameters are automatically added by the class and the name is matched after the parameters are added (CRONTASKPARAM.PARAMETER)

value.description: The value of the Cron Task parameter (CRONTASKPARAM.VALUE)

delete.description: Flag to indicate that the logger should be deleted if it exists from the target system.

logger.description: The base logger name for the Maximo logger (MAXLOGGER.LOGGER)

parentLogKey.description: The log key for the parent logger, this is used to find the parent logger Id (MAXLOGGER.PARENTLOGGERID)

logKey.description: The log key for the logger, if not provided defaults to log4j.logger.maximo. plus the logger name (MAXLOGGER.LOGKEY)

logLevel.description: The log level for the Maximo logger (MAXLOGGER.LOGLEVEL)

active.description: Flag to indicate if the logger is active or not (MAXLOGGER.ACTIVE)

appenders.description: A comma delimited list of appenders  Maximo logger (MAXLOGGER.APPENDERS)

delete.description: Flag to indicate that the message should be deleted if it exists from the target system.

msgGroup.description: The group for the Maximo message (MAXMESSAGES.MSGGROUP)

msgKey.description: The key for the Maximo message (MAXMESSAGES.MSGKEY)

value.description: The value for the Maximo message (MAXMESSAGES.VALUE)

displayMethod.description: The display for the Maximo message (MAXMESSAGES.DISPLAYMETHOD)

options.description: The display options for the Maximo message, values are derived from the UI labels and translated to the internal integer value (MAXMESSAGES.OPTIONS)

prefix.description: The message prefix for the Maximo message (MAXMESSAGES.MSGIDPREFIX)

suffix.description: The message suffix for the Maximo message (MAXMESSAGES.MSGIDSUFFIX)

explanation.description: The value for the Maximo message explanation (MAXMESSAGES.EXPLANATION)

operatorResponse.description: The value for the Maximo message operator response (MAXMESSAGES.OPERATORRESPONSE)

adminResponse.description: The value for the Maximo message admin response (MAXMESSAGES.ADMINRESPONSE)

systemAction.description: The value for the Maximo message system action (MAXMESSAGES.SYSTEMACTION)

delete.description: Flag to indicate that the property should be deleted if it exists from the target system.

propName.description: The name for the Maximo property (MAXPROP.PROPNAME)

description.description: The property description for the Maximo property (MAXPROP.DESCRIPTION)

domainId.description: The Maximo domain Id associated with the Maximo property. (MAXPROP.DOMAINID)

encrypted.description: Flag to indicate if the Maximo property is encrypted or not (MAXPROP.ENCRYPTED)

globalOnly.description: Flag to indicate if the Maximo property is only available in a global context or not (MAXPROP.GLOBALONLY)

instanceOnly.description: Flag to indicate if the Maximo property is only available in an instance context or not (MAXPROP.INSTANCEONLY)

liveRefresh.description: Flag to indicate if the Maximo property is able to be live refreshed or not (MAXPROP.LIVEREFRESH)

masked.description: Flag to indicate if the Maximo property is masked or not when displayed in the System Properties application (MAXPROP.MASKED)

maxType.description: The Maximo data type of the property (MAXPROP.MAXTYPE)

nullsAllowed.description: Flag to indicate if the Maximo property allows nulls or not (MAXPROP.NULLSALLOWED)

onlineChanges.description: Flag to indicate if the Maximo property may be overridden via the Maximo System Properties application or not (MAXPROP.ONLINECHANGES)

secureLevel.description: The level of access permitted for the property (MAXPROP.SECURELEVEL)

propValue.description: The global value for the property (MAXPROP.DISPPROPVALUE)

maximoDefault.description: The Maximo default value for the property (MAXPROP.MAXIMODEFAULT)

serverName.description: The name of the Maximo server for the property instance (MAXPROPINSTANCE.SERVERNAME)

propValue.description: The value of the Maximo server for the property instance (MAXPROPINSTANCE.DISPPROPVALUE)

serverHost.description: The value of the Maximo server host name for the property instance (MAXPROPINSTANCE.SERVERHOST)
